Code.Text: Waiting for bird to catch up.

PickUp.QuestName: What Came First, the Drake or the Egg?

TurnIn.QuestName: What Came First, the Drake or the Egg?

Code.UseWhen: DoQuest(10747) && Me.CurrentTarget != null && Me.CurrentTarget.Entry == 21387 && Me.CurrentTarget.IsAlive && Me.CurrentTarget.InLineOfSight && !Blacklist.Contains(Me.CurrentTarget, BlacklistFlags.Combat)

PickUp.QuestName: Baron Sablemane Has Requested Your Presence

TurnIn.QuestName: Baron Sablemane Has Requested Your Presence
